data.text: @Failingatthis @lapublichealth Wear your mask and shut up.

@Failingatthis @LyndaPaulson @lapublichealth dr. Renee... getting sick is part of living on planet earth. There is a reason for it. Once again, you are an uneducated parent doing a diservice to your child. Why don't you and your family just move to Antarctica and live in an igloo? What a moron.

@ScenarioRosey @anti_putin_bot @CameronMKaplan @lapublichealth This says total K-12 enrollment says the county is ~3.2x of LAUSD enrollment. That'd be ~350 per day that weren't happening at the lows. Throw in college testing, and you're getting close to a decently high base that didn't exist in earlier periods. https://t.co/TkaGgb86qB

@LyndaPaulson @lapublichealth also, you do know Vaccines don't stop you from getting Covid-19 or even stop the spread of Covid-19 they just Hopefully stop Covid-19 from putting you in the Hospital also No Masks are not 100% but I rather put on a mask and risk it then breathe in someone's sprew 1
@anti_putin_bot @SurlMudgeon @CameronMKaplan @lapublichealth LOL you asking me that is like Michael Jordan asking me how to dribble.
@ScenarioRosey @SurlMudgeon @CameronMKaplan @lapublichealth So why is it tiny there but much higher elsewhere...

@SurlMudgeon @anti_putin_bot @CameronMKaplan @lapublichealth LAUSD had only 799 over past 7 days, so average of 114.
The positivity rate at schools is now so tiny, they can’t be adding very many cases overall.
